document_data.mainbody:
High Priestess Aummerglau Tistrin, who was also called the Sun of Ordulin because of her legendary beauty, was the ranking priest of the House of Revels, a temple dedicated to Sune, in Ordulin in the .
Aummerglau was the leader of Sunes faithful in Ordulin. Her congregation within the temple consisted of 29 other priestesses and 56 followers.
